item.title: Cryptsetup Create Linux Encrypted Volumes
item.description: What's Cryptsetup? According to Cryptsetup's Gitlab project page; Cryptsetup is utility used to conveniently setup disk encryption based on DMCrypt kernel module. These include plain dm-crypt volumes, LUKS volumes, loop-AES and TrueCrypt (including VeraCrypt extension) format. Project also includes veritysetup utility used to conveniently setup DMVerity block integrity checking kernel module.
